mods.abstract: Christian Brothers College freshmen in 1949, room 115. First row: Dino Paccasassi, Edmund Foley, Edward Reilly, Joseph Greganti, David Vaccaro, Billy Walker, Walter Miller, Sam Lobianco, Nello Ragghianti, Leo Lazarini. Second row: Richartz Shelton, Russell Bowden, Robert Davis, Richard Hagerty, James Cara, Harold Balton, Billy Johnson, Charles Maness, Larry La Moore, Al Bryson, John Ellis. Third row: Joe Battaile, Joe Neri, Frank Dichtel, Salva Destefanis, Sam Zerilla, Kit Arnoult, Bill Gavin, Michael Whalen, Robert Colbert, Pat Tata.

For all requests, please contact the Archives at archives@cbu.edu.
